Metadata.title: AdWall Lab — Ad recommendation museum
Metadata.description: AdWall Lab offers a transparent, playful way to observe ads in context. Switch to SuperWall for a huge ad grid.

App.title: AdWall Lab
App.heroDesc: By default we propose Safe Ads (non‑personalized). You can switch to Personalized Ads in Cookie settings.

SuperWall.title: SuperWall Canvas
SuperWall.desc: A vast, 4-direction scrollable grid simulating the 'Million Dollar Homepage' but with algorithmic ad placement.

Consent.bannerText: This site proposes Safe Ads (non‑personalized) by default. Choose your preference.
Consent.modalDesc: Choose your ad & analytics preferences. You can change this anytime.
Consent.optSafeDesc: Ads are shown based on context, not your history.
